name: Space Station Coots
description:
Ludwig Game Jam 2023

https://github.com/ThurritoHatinEgotude/Unity-SpaceStationCoots

You've accidentally teleported yourself onto Space Station Coots, a long abandoned spacecraft. Fortunately for you there's a teleporter on board and it's powered by cheese, how convenient for a robotic mouse like yourself! Unfortunately for you, the space station's security systems are online and CootsBots patrol the ship. These feline terrors are programmed to do one thing and that's destroy you. Can you collect all of the cheese, find the teleporter, and escape with your life? Or will you become cat food for these robotic terrors?

This game was inspired by Space Station Silicon Valley, a personal favorite of mine on the N64. I know it's a bit basic but hopefully some people will find it fun. Thanks for playing!

If the game plays poorly in the browser then you can download the build and run it yourself.
